job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to applying new features of a cloud platform (AWS).
This indicates the integration or development of services related to Large Language Models, which falls under GenAI specialization.
This directly relates to the maintenance of an MLOps platform, a core task in AI operations.
Improving usability based on user feedback is a standard software development task focused on the user experience of a product.
Monitoring resources and costs is an operational task, particularly relevant in cloud and MLOps environments.

job_tasks.phrase: Beheren van de AWS accounts, incl. privacy & security
job_tasks.justification: Managing cloud accounts, including security and privacy, is an operational responsibility within a cloud infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Opzetten van data pipelines voor specifieke use cases
job_tasks.justification: Setting up data pipelines is a data engineering task crucial for preparing data for AI/ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Meedenken met de data scientisten om een PoC om te zetten naar een productiewaardige oplossing gebruikmakend van het MLOps platform
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of taking a Proof of Concept (PoC) and turning it into a production-ready solution, which is a core software engineering and integration task.

soft_skills.phrase: Hiervoor werk je natuurlijk nauw samen met de data scientisten
Naast de samenwerking met de data scientisten zal je veel contact hebben met het ITOps team

profile.rationale: The job ad explicitly mentions 'LLM Services toevoegen' (adding LLM Services) and the maintenance of an 'MLOps platform'. It also involves applying new AWS features and setting up data pipelines. The role requires collaboration with data scientists to turn PoCs into production-ready solutions using the MLOps platform. This indicates a strong blend of core software engineering tasks (MLOps, data pipelines, integrating solutions) and specific GenAI specialization (LLM Services). The emphasis on MLOps and integrating AI solutions into production points towards a 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to LLM services, MLOps, data pipelines, and integrating AI solutions into production. The language is specific enough to confidently assign categories and determine the profile.
